entity.name: class_of_connection_of_product_with_involvements
entity.description: A class_of_connection_of_product_with_involvements is a type of class_of_connection_of_product and a class_of_product. It is defined so that instances of class_of_product can be involved in a connection.

entity.name: class_of_involvement_of_product_in_connection
entity.description: A class_of_involvement_of_product_in_connection is a type of product_definition_formation_relationship that is a Class_of_involvement_of_product_in_connection. (as defined in the ARM).

explicit.name: related_product_definition_formation
explicit.description: a class_of_product that is used to make the connection.
